summary: Recently widowed Sandra Demarest arrives at the isolated home of her late husband for his wake, but his uncle will not allow her to view the corpse.
cast: Errol Flynn|Barbara Stanwyck|Geraldine Brooks|Richard Basehart|Jerome Cowan|John Ridgely|Patricia Barry|Rory Mallinson|Helene Thimig|Paul Stanton|Barry Bernard|John Elliott|Lisa Golm|Creighton Hale|Jack Mower|Paul Panzer
title: El aullido del lobo
